metadata.title: CVE-2017-9269 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In libzypp before August 2018 GPG keys attached to YUM repositories were not correctly pinned, allowing malicious repository mirrors to silently downgrade to unsigned repositories with potential malicious content.

criterions.comment: libzypp package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '17.6.1-1').
